SEARCH
Package login

Class LoginMenu

java.lang.Object
login.LoginMenu
public class LoginMenu extends Object
The LoginMenu class handles the user interface for logging in as either a patient or a staff member. It provides the functionality for authenticating users, changing passwords upon first login, and handling user input through menus.

The class provides the following features:

  • Displays the login menu, allowing users to choose between logging in as a patient or a staff member.
  • Authenticates patients and staff by verifying their ID and password.
  • Prompts users to change their password if they log in with the default password "password".
  • Validates new passwords based on predefined criteria.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    LoginMenu()
    Constructs a LoginMenu instance and initializes the authentication status and login manager for handling login and password management.

      public boolean isAuthenticated()

      Returns:

    • displayMenu

      public void displayMenu() throws Exception
      Displays the login menu and prompts the user to select a role (Patient or Staff). The user is then directed to the respective login flow.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the login process
